text: Alexander Andrew Macdonell Fraser, Baron Fraser of Corriegarth (2 December 1946 â€“ 6 February 2021) was a treasurer of the Conservative Party of the United Kingdom. He was a member of the House of Lords. He was described variously as a "stockbroker" or an "investment banker". He died on 6 February 2021, from a brain tumour, at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Conservative Life Peers
title: Andrew Fraser, Baron Fraser of Corriegarth
